About Me

A few things about me:

Hi there and welcome to my site!

My name is Khanh. I like to code and learn interesting things. I'm a developer and a native of Northern Virginia. While I have a degree in computer science, I've been learning web and frontend development on my own.


I adopted a cat in July. His name is Pudgie. He's the sweetest cat you'll ever meet - I can guarantee! He's a pretty special cat, because he not only has just one eye, but a broken tail, a busted toe, and he can high-five.

Education

I graduated May of 2017 with degrees in Computer Science and Women, Gender, and Sexuality Studies.

My favorite classes included Web Development, Mobile App Development, and LGBTQ Studies.

Current Role

I recently joined ConsenSys DC, a blockchain startup that focuses on Ethereum and smart contracts.

I'm currently working on a React-based web application that interacts with smart contracts and a blockchain.

Interests and Hobbies

I'm often on Reddit reading and learning about Web Development. I also built my own desktop, and keep up with the latest news in mobile phones and computer hardware.

I also learned to sew so that I can hem my own pants because I'm too short.
